story.storykicker: Tripura Class 12 Arts/ Commerce results are to be declared soon i.e. June 2 on the official website www.tripuraresults.nic.in. All the candidates are advised to keep a check on the official website for latest information.
story.storybody:
Tripura Class 12 Arts/ Commerce results are to be declared soon i.e. June 2 on the official website www.tripuraresults.nic.in.

The board conducted the examination of all streams of Class 12 from March 2 to April 4 at various test centers across the state.

Meanwhile, the Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE) declared the result of the Class 12 science stream examination on May 21.

(Read: Tripura TBSE Class 12 (Science) 2016 results declared at www.tripuraresults.nic.in )

How to check the results:

All the candidates are requested to visit the official website, and click on relevant link. The candidates need to fill all the required details such as name and roll number in the space provided.  After the results will be displayed, candidates are advised to take hardcopy of the same for future reference.

About TBSE:

Tripura Board of Secondary Education was established in the year 1973 under the Tripura Act. No.12 and was named after Tripura Board of Secondary Education Act, 1973 by Tripura Legislative Assembly.

It is a state agency of the government of Tripura, which is responsible for the promotion and development of secondary education, in the state. Most of the public schools of the state follow the TBSE system. 

Read: Intel competition in US awards six Indian students

For exam related news click here.
